Su sueño es tener casa propia para disfrutarla con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos de 5 y 10 años de edad  y adquirir un vehículo para el transporte de mercancía para el negocio, porque hasta ahora alquila este servicio.
texts.en:
After having been employed at a glazier, Ferney López O. followed his dream to become independent and opened his own shop four years ago in Bogotá’s Alquería La Fragua neighborhood. He entered into a partnership and opened a business making shower enclosures; this lasted only six months. He then met a big challenge with a new locale in the Kennedy neighborhood called “Vidrios el Rey,” a glazier shop where he makes shower enclosures and general cabinetry. His greatest challenge was dissolving the partnership because he lost a lot of money and was decapitalized. But, he continued to offer his services and has managed to move ahead. This will be his 1st loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. He will use it to buy raw materials for cabinet making like, glass and aluminum; he will also use it to repair his sandblaster, which is equipment that shoots abrasive materials under pressure to bring about changes on rigid surfaces like the ones Ferney uses as his main raw ingredients: glass, marble, acrylic, wood and steel. With this equipment he will be able to optimize results, have more uniformity, lessen labor costs, minimize job completion time, insure better finish adherence and anchoring and attain more purity in the materials with a minimum of effort. His dream is to own his own house to enjoy with his wife and two children, who are 5 and 10 years of age, as well as to acquire a vehicle to transport merchandise for his business because to date he leases this service.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy cabinet making raw materials like glass and aluminum; also to repair his sandblaster.

loans.name: Tepeko Ole

texts.en:
Tepeko Ole S. is 45 years old. He is married to Wanjiku S. and he is the father of five children.

Tepeko is a farmer and he does the farming on his own piece of land which he has been doing for the last ten years.

Tepeko learned about KADET from a friend in his locality who is already a KADET registered client. This will be Tepeko’s second loan. He is planning to plant twenty acres of wheat which has proved to be doing very well in his area and keep some sheep for fattening to sell later.

With the profits Tepeko hopes to make from the proceeds of this loan, he plans to hire more land for farming to increase his wheat production. The area has favorable climate for wheat farming thus making him think of wheat farming only.

Tepeko’s future dream is that he will be able to buy a bigger piece of land whereby he can be planting more wheat for commercial purposes and be the leading farmer in his area.

Tepeko’s hope and dream is to become a large-scale farmer and have his own farm machinery.

loans.use: To plant twenty acres of wheat and raise sheep

loans.name: Lemara Ole

texts.en:
Lemara Ole N. is 39 years old. He is married to Mampai Lamara N. and he is the father of eight children. 

Lemara is a farmer and he does the farming on his own piece of land which he has been doing for the last fourteen years.

Lemara learned about KADET from a friend who is already a KADET registered client. This will be Lemara’s first loan. He is planning to spend 20,000 shillings on maize and 30,000 shillings on wheat farming.

With the profits Lemara hopes to make from the proceeds of this loan, he plans to hire more land for farming to increase his maize and wheat production. He also hopes to buy a few bulls for fattening and selling latter.

Lemara’s future dream is that he will be able to educate all his children and built a nice house for his family to live in. He is a hardworking man who is determined to achieve his set goals.

loans.use: To plant maize and wheat

loans.name: Lemeria Ole

texts.en:
Lemeria Ole K. is 54 years old. He is married to Naramat K. and he is the father of eight children. 

Lemeria is a farmer and he does the farming on his own piece of land which he has been doing for the last fourteen years.

Lemeria learned about KADET from a friend who is already a KADET registered client. This will be Lemeria’s first loan. He is planning to spend 30,000 on maize and 20,000 on wheat farming.

With the profits Lemeria hopes to make from the proceeds of this loan, he plans to hire more land for farming to increase his maize and wheat production. He also hopes to buy some livestock and start livestock farming.

Lemeria’s future dream is that he will be able to practice large-scale farming for both wheat and maize. He is a hardworking man who is determined to achieve his set goals.

loans.use: To plant maize and wheat

loans.name: Riamet

texts.en:
Riamet M. is 23 years old. He a single young man who is focused on farming.

Riamet is a farmer and he has been doing this for the last four years. His farm is in a productive area which has proved to be good for wheat farming.

Riamet learned about KADET through friends who are KADET registered clients. This will be his first loan which he is planning to use to plant wheat which normally does well in his area due to good climatic conditions. He hopes to use the profit from this loan to acquire more land for farming to meet the demand for wheat.

Riamet’s hope and dream is to become a large-scale farmer and have his own farm machinery. He is a young and energetic man who can do more if supported.

loans.use: To plant wheat

loans.name: Paris Enole

texts.en:
Paris Enole M. is 37 years old. She is a widow and the mother of seven children. She is a farmer and she does the farming on her own piece of land which she has been doing for the last seven years.

Paris learned about KADET through a friend who is already registered member. This will be her first loan which she is planning to use to plant more maize which normally does well in her area due to good climatic conditions.

Paris hopes to use the profit from the proceeds of this loan to expand her farming activity from small-scale to commercial farming.

Paris’s dream is to do large-scale farming and attain financial independence. Despite being a widow, she is a hardworking woman who is determined to achieve her set goals.

loans.use: To plant more maize

loans.name: Regina Nancha

texts.en:
Regina Nancha S. is 43 years old. She is married to Charles S. and has one child.

Regina is a farmer. She farms her own piece of land, which she has been doing for the last seven years.

She learned about KADET from other women in a group already registered with KADET in her area of residence. This will be her second loan. She is planning to use the loan to prepare the land for planting potatoes and to start sheep rearing. Potatoes have been doing well in her area due to good climatic conditions. She hopes to use the profit from the proceeds of this loan to expand her farming activity from small-scale to commercial farming.

Regina's dream is to do large-scale farming and attain financial independence. She is a hardworking woman who is determined to achieve her goals.

loans.use: To prepare land for planting potatoes and to start sheep rearing

loans.name: Irene Namunyak

texts.en:
Irene Namunyak N., 33, is married to Salibu N. and the mother of three children. Farming on her own piece of land for the past seven years, Irene was introduced to KADET by a friend who is a KADET client in her area of residence. This will be her second loan with which she is planning to prepare her land for wheat planting. Wheat has been doing well in her area due to good climatic conditions and a market of local millers who come to buy the produce from the farmers.

A hardworking woman, Irene hopes to use the profits arising from this loan to expand her farming activity from small scale to commercial farming in order to attain financial independence.

loans.use: To prepare land for wheat planting
